english_example_sentence: I hope you always seem like a happy and healthy family.
russian_example_sentence: Надеюсь, вы всегда кажетесь счастливой и здоровой семьей.
turkish_example_sentence: Umarım siz her zaman mutlu ve sağlıklı bir aile görünesiniz.
